data.text: @RNAiAnalyst My husband is awaiting in Australia

@Ejzner Depends on the country. I have my Nuvaxovid #booster appt next week (in Germany). 

Will tell them that I have read and experienced side effects feom mRNA (and adeno), so would like to try protein. $nvax
@RNAiAnalyst So u need some medical recommendation or something like that to be able to get Nuvaxovid, or how do they decide who's suitable?
